name: Billiards Wizards (itch)
description:
Are you prepared for the magic on your cue stick? Billiards Wizards is the most enchanting pool game you ever seen. Get the right spells during the match and perform nice magical shots. You can create impossible moves or even just distract your opponents. Combine your billiards techniques with these incredible spells.

Show your powers, invite your friends, and defeat your enemies! Billiards Wizards supports as much local as online matches, and direct invitation to another wizards by their names, right there from your mobile. Fight a battle everywhere, become the real Billiards Wizard!
